text: 28|4|tirccayayum phir'aun nattil aunnatyam naticcu. avitattukare avan vyatyasta kaksikalakkittirkkukayum ceytu. avaril oru vibhagatte durbalarakkiyitt avarute anmakkale arukeala natattukayum avarute penmakkale jivikkan anuvadikkukayum ceytukeantâ€Œ. tirccayayum avan nasakarikalil pettavanayirunnu
